New-York Historical Society
Julius Dintenfass papers concerning the Welch Memorial Fund letters
Dintenfass, Julius
AHMC - Dintenfass, Julius
.1 Linear feet in one folder
1961-1993 The papers hold various documents related to autograph collector Julius Dintenfass's (circa 1911-1997) research into the Welch Memorial Fund letters and to his publication of an article about the letters in the journal "Manuscripts." These include lists and inventories of the letters, correspondence with Welch descendants and others in 1961-1962, photoreproductions of an 1890 report about the Welch Fund prepared by Treasurer Edward P. Clark and of a few related biographical articles, brief working notes, correspondence with "Manuscripts" editor David R. Chesnutt from 1992-1993, and copies of the article as submitted to "Manuscripts."
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Julius Dintenfass papers concerning the Welch Memorial Fund letters.
